Posted By: Superllama12 (1/26/2012 3:47:06 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Great intersection between the colours to design this card out of. The only thing is, it doesn't synergise with Burning Vengeance as much as it might seem, because you're presumably playing with a whole lot of flashback cards which have a lot more value in the graveyard than normal, reducing the value of this card. Tho its flashback will still trigger it and [Secrets of the Dead](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Secrets of the Dead).  
  
Edit - this card is quite similar to [Recoup](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Recoup); probably better becuase you can recur the cards and play them seperately, rather than needing all the mana at once.
posts.html:
Great intersection between the colours to design this card out of. The only thing is, it doesn't synergise with Burning Vengeance as much as it might seem, because you're presumably playing with a whole lot of flashback cards which have a lot more value in the graveyard than normal, reducing the value of this card. Tho its flashback will still trigger it and Secrets of the Dead.

posts.post_content: This to return my [Blessings of Nature](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Blessings of Nature) (used with miracle) back to my hand after I used it to boost my chrs using [Wild Defiance](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Wild Defiance). only to play Blessings again later on.. posts.post_content: I found the weirdest use for this recently - ran it in a Red/Black Madness deck. Nothing like pitching it to give a [Trespasser il-Vec](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Trespasser il-Vec) shadow and then using the flashback to bring back a [Dark Withering](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Dark Withering) for removal or [Call to the Netherworld](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Call to the Netherworld) to get a creature. In that respect it can provide some remarkable utility.
posts.html:
I found the weirdest use for this recently - ran it in a Red/Black Madness deck. In that respect it can provide some remarkable utility.

posts.post_content:
[Runic Repitition](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Runic Repitition), [Talrand, Sky Summoner](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Talrand, Sky Summoner), [Arcane Melee](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Arcane Melee) and this. Congratulations, you now have ![1](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=1&type=symbol)![Blue](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=U&type=symbol)![Blue](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=U&type=symbol)![Red](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=R&type=symbol): make three 2/2 drakes with flying and return target instant or sorcery to your hand. Proceed to go, collect $200, and repeat as long as you have mana.  
  
Add in [Secrets of the Dead](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Secrets of the Dead) and [Burning Vengeance](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Burning Vengeance), and you have that PLUS draw a card and a shock.  
  
However, you simply CAN'T do it at instant speed, since that would be broken
